title: DAI for an archive game when an ad-break starts
custom_preconds:
GIVEN have access to the system configuration file
AND set the flag "isGoogleVerboseReportingEnabled" to true in the configuration file
custom_steps: WHEN the user launch an archive or live content playback.
custom_expected:
THEN observe dai.google.com URL in your proxy tool/ debug panel.
AND as the ad break starts, verify that the quartile tracking is initiated.
AND Throughout the ad break, confirm the following quartiles are tracked in sequential order:

the first ad-break start
---
1. DAI AdBreak Start
2. DAI Ad Start
3. start
4. firstquartile
5. midpoint
6. thirdquartile
7. complete
8. DAI Ad End
Below you'll see until the penultimate ad-break. For example: second, third, forth (until the second last ad-break)
---

9. DAI Ad Start
10. start
11. firstquartile
12. midpoint
13. thirdquartile
14. complete
15. DAI Ad End
Last Ad Break
---

16. DAI Ad Start
17. start
18. firstquartile
19. midpoint
20. thirdquartile
21. complete
22. DAI Ad End
23. DAI AdBread End

***The steps mentioned above are repeated until we reach the very end of the ad-break.***

Ensure that each quartile is recorded accurately and in the correct order.
Verify that the quartile tracking remains active until the ad break completes.

Here's an example URL: https://dai.google.com/view/p/service/linear/stream/6cf4584d-1e36-4f94-9e1b-c1c33c8096d5:MRN2/loc/MRN2/network/2605/event/tCsTkacJQGWBK3c8AxXJ0g/media/google_UPb_O0R_wqsUV949kWxZkkDIIbkEDMzHM2bc1jH-vvw

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13548113)

title: DAI for a Live game when an ad break starts
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user have access to the application's configuration file
AND set the flag "isGoogleVerboseReportingEnabled" to true in the configuration file
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launch and start playing a LIVE game
AND observe the dai.google.com URL in my proxy tool or debug panel
custom_expected:
THEN the user should confirm the following quartiles are tracked in sequential order throughout the ad break:
1. DAI AdBreak Start
2. DAI Ad Start
3. start
4. firstquartile
5. midpoint
6. thirdquartile
7. complete
8. DAI Ad End
Ensure that each quartile is recorded accurately and in the correct order.
Verify that the quartile tracking remains active until the ad break completes.

Here's an example URL: https://dai.google.com/view/p/service/linear/stream/6cf4584d-1e36-4f94-9e1b-c1c33c8096d5:MRN2/loc/MRN2/network/2605/event/tCsTkacJQGWBK3c8AxXJ0g/media/google_UPb_O0R_wqsUV949kWxZkkDIIbkEDMzHM2bc1jH-vvw

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13548113)

title: DAI for an archive game when an ad break is paused
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user have access to the application's configuration file
AND set the flag "isGoogleVerboseReportingEnabled" to true in the configuration file
custom_steps:
WHEN play an archived game
AND wait for the video to enter an ad break
AND pause the playback
custom_expected:
THEN should see the quartile tracking events based on the point at which the ad break was paused

Here's an example URL:https://dai.google.com/view/p/service/linear/stream/9bfa370c-d131-4561-868e-f1aad21f2068:MRN2/loc/MRN2/network/2605/event/O2b7kulhRUynh3hoMjOg0w/media/google_9JGJ7C4twzlCVL_lBRrKdBAk4751zYeuYPC2RLrGD1Y

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13548486)

title: DAI for a Live game when an ad break is paused
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user have access to the application's configuration file
AND set the flag "isGoogleVerboseReportingEnabled" to true in the configuration file
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launch a LIVE game and start playing a video with an ad break
AND pause the playback when the ad break starts
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be able to see the quartile tracking calls in the debug panel
AND the quartile tracking events should correspond to the point at which the user paused the ad break

Here's an example URL:https://dai.google.com/view/p/service/linear/stream/9bfa370c-d131-4561-868e-f1aad21f2068:MRN2/loc/MRN2/network/2605/event/O2b7kulhRUynh3hoMjOg0w/media/google_9JGJ7C4twzlCVL_lBRrKdBAk4751zYeuYPC2RLrGD1Y

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13548486)

title: Verifying start playback in the middle of an ad break (archive feed)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user have access to the application's configuration file
AND set the flag "isGoogleVerboseReportingEnabled" to true in the configuration file
custom_steps:
WHEN start an archived game
AND an ad break occurs
AND I exit the stream and then rejoin
custom_expected:
THEN observe the dai.google.com URL proxy tool/ debug panel of the device

Here's an example URL: https://dai.google.com/view/p/service/linear/stream/5b2c7c0e-e5e4-4330-bca9-53af0780803f:CBF2/loc/CBF2/network/2605/event/zl9kDe3lQVuCWfwLUCPgJQ/media/google_7999819746619495965

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13548190)

title: Verifying start playback in the middle of an ad break (live feed)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user have access to the application's configuration file
AND set the flag "isGoogleVerboseReportingEnabled" to true in the configuration file
AND a LIVE game is in progress
custom_steps:
WHEN the user exit the stream during an ad break
AND rejoin the stream
custom_expected:
THEN observe the dai.google.com URL 
AND ensure that the right quartile tracking is initiated when the ad break begins
AND verify that the third quartile appears on the screen from the point where the re-entered the stream
AND verify that playback continues to completion

Here's an example URL: https://dai.google.com/view/p/service/linear/stream/5b2c7c0e-e5e4-4330-bca9-53af0780803f:CBF2/loc/CBF2/network/2605/event/zl9kDe3lQVuCWfwLUCPgJQ/media/google_7999819746619495965

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13548190)

title: Ad Break Interruption and Resumption during network connectivity issues
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user have access to the application's configuration file
AND set the flag "isGoogleVerboseReportingEnabled" to true in the configuration file
AND have started an archived game with a stable network connection
custom_steps:
When the user wait for an ad break during the stream
AND the user simulate a network connectivity issue by disconnecting the internet while the ad break is playing
AND wait for a few moments to simulate the interruption
AND restore the network connectivity
custom_expected:
THEN the user should observe the behavior of quartile tracking and ad break resumption
AND the system should correctly track and resume the ad break from the point of interruption
AND the quartile tracking should accurately reflect the progress of the ad break after resuming
AND the playback should continue seamlessly without any disruptions or visual anomalies
